# Option\_2 interface

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

[Expression](./messageformat.expression.md) and [MarkupStart](./messageformat.markupstart.md) options are expressed as `key`<!-- -->/`value` pairs to allow their order to be maintained.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Option 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [name](./messageformat.option_2.name.md) |  | string | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> |
|  [value](./messageformat.option_2.value.md) |  | [Literal](./messageformat.literal.md) \| [VariableRef](./messageformat.variableref.md) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> |
